ai-atk-s0402a18:1_0: Once again and again five kinds of determination.
ai-atk-s0402a18:1_2: to end the fetters of rebirth.
ai-atk-s0402a18:1_4: It’s for the ending of defilements.
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_0: Hearing his words, thinking, “Take elderly,”—“This is anger,”—“This is very blameworthy.
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_1: For this reason and the misapprehending for the repair of the mark of mustard seeds.
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_2: This is the nine classes of rebirth.
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_3: Having passed away: he would be escaped;
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_5: Seeing negligence, there is a defilement, the five kinds of sensual stimulation for the five kinds of sensual stimulation.
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_6: but there is nothing bigger than that.
ai-atk-s0402a18:3_0: The successive permutation series with greed is finished.
ai-atk-s0402a18:4_0: The Visākha are running errands and messages for the Nuns
ai-atk-s0402a18:5_0: The Book of the Twos is finished.
ai-atk-s0402a18:6_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
